https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eUajFqB0xCrCofSS5r49oDZa0ON.jpg Denis went into the office Friday morning. Ten minutes later he was fired and his entire world changed. As a man in mid-life crisis, he believed there has to be more to life than this. A stray dog in the park opens his eyes. Abrupt Decision
